name: Afterschool Secret
description:
After School Secret is a single player “first person puncher” for mobile. Gameplay consists of on-rails movement and a mixture of taps and swipes for controls, with combat being broken up by short cutscenes with a Horror/Campy theme. 

My role in the development is Gameplay Programmer and Audio Programmer (Mohammadreza Heidari)

Made by Chillbeats Production , KDU University 2019.
